attributes.action: change the country's national anthem to "Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that Bohemian Rhapsody is far more appropriate in the modern age for the National Anthem of Great Britain. It would also sound far cooler if we all were to sing it at major sporting events - SCARAMOUCHE, SCARAMOUCHE

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
